head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLMAN, GERALD S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLMAN, GERALD S.

block.p: COLMAN-Gerald S. On July 17, 2000 after a valiant battle with Hodgkins disease. Cherished husband of Judith Leuchter, doting father of Emily Colman, loving son of Cy and Evelyn and the late Ethel Colman. Dear brother of Debbie Skolnick, exemplary brother-in-law and uncle. A writer and creative director in advertising. Leaves many devoted friends and colleagues. Services Thursday, 11:15 AM, ''The Riverside'' 76th St and Amsterdam Ave.
